turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! how can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I would like Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and would you like me to suggest a drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Eggnog latte is very popular

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'd rather have a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay a caramel macchiato and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful. Did you want anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have a extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, I have a caramel macchiato with an extra shot of espresso, sized grande, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have non-fat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, let me adjust the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's a grande caramel macchiato with 1 shot of espresso and non-fat milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks did you want it from again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on Post Oak Boulevard in Houston.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I've placed your order with the Starbucks in Post Oak Blvd, houston, texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm happy to help.
